segments.advisor_message: So, let’s talk about your assets for a bit. Can you tell me if you own any notable items, like collectibles or something along those lines?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah! I mean, I do have some, uh, pretty valuable stuff. Like, I have this classic car, a 1965 Mustang, you know? It was my dad’s. Can’t remember exactly how much we, um, originally paid for it, but... it’s worth quite a bit now, I think maybe around 30,000?

segments.advisor_message: That sounds great! A 1965 Mustang is definitely a classic. Did you also want to mention anything about its condition or any repairs done?
segments.client_message: Yeah, so, it’s in pretty good shape! Like, I had some work done on the engine last year, you know, just to keep it running smoothly. Oh, and I should mention, I also have a few antique coins—those were inherited and, um, probably worth around 5,000 total, but, like, they’re not in perfect condition.
